title: 我不明白
author: 潜影贝
txt_content:
在这个帖子里，为什么@china521 要对我这么说
我只不过是想保护一下不可再生资源吗，有错吗？
怪我咯？

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
哈？你在说什么 一脸懵逼






"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
额，你要去问的话就去私信吧 发帖有点那啥






"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.txt_content:
潜影贝 发表于 2016-10-19 19:02
所以木头是可再生的，不可再生的是泥土、沙子什么的
是的，但无限大的世界不会缺少这些东西的
